blog.title: How bots exploited my ImageGen contract - and how I fixed it
blog.description: A bot network exploited a vulnerability in my GenImNFT contract, extracting over 80 cents. Here's how they did it, how I fixed it, and what the forensic analysis revealed about the bot network that seemingly extracts substantial sums.

nftMetadata.description: AI generated artwork based on the prompt: "A high-quality, cinematic illustration showing a swarm of autonomous blockchain bots attacking a vulnerable smart contract. Visualize stylized digital “bot” entities (glowing geometric shapes or small drone-like agents) racing through a mempool-like network grid toward a smart-contract block labeled “GenImNFT”. One bot steals a tiny coin reward (symbolizing 80 cents), while alarms or red warning indicators flash around the contract. The scene should look technical, cyber-forensic, and slightly humorous due to the small value stolen. Use a dark, neon, cyberpunk color palette of blues, teals, and pinks. Include subtle blockchain motifs (Ethereum logo fragments, gas-fee graphs, bridging arrows). No text overlays."

prevBlog.title: Democracy beyond the nation-state - What is there ?
prevBlog.description: When climate, water, and digital challenges cross borders but democracy doesn't, what's the alternative? This narrative essay compares confederation, federation, and cosmopolitan democracy through three fictional characters on a Barcelona-Tunis ferry.

nftMetadata.description: AI generated artwork based on the prompt: "A quiet 2 a.m. ferry lounge between Barcelona and Tunis. Three characters sit apart but connected by scattered documents: Amara with Mediterranean water-basin charts, Sofia with EU briefing notes, and Adam with a glowing laptop showing AI regulations. Soft overhead ferry lights, empty seats, coffee machine humming in the background. Behind them, faint symbolic overlays: a confederation map dissolving into fragments, a federal structure with connected nodes, and a network-like web representing cosmopolitan democracy. Moody, reflective, cinematic atmosphere."
